title: UpCircle Coffee Face Scrub - Citrus Blend For Normal + Dry Skin 100ml - Shea Butter, Coconut + Rosehip Oil - Natural, Vegan Face Exfoliator For Soft, Smooth Skin

features: ORGANIC FACE SCRUB FORMULATED FOR DRY AND DEHYDRATED SKIN: Gentle coffee face scrub formulated for dry, dehydrated skin with nourishing and hydrating rosehip, sweet orange and lemon verbena essential oils.
FOR SOFT, SMOOTH, NOURISHED SKIN: This face scrub gently buffs away dry, dead cells to leave you feeling soft, smooth and glowy.
IMPROVES SKIN TEXTURE AND TONE: This face scrub helps to calm redness and inflammation, whilst nourishing and protecting the skin with a hydrating blend of moisturising oils.
ETHICAL, SUSTAINABLE, GOOD FOR THE WORLD: Reused, repurposed, reloved. This scrub is made with top-quality Arabica coffee grounds sourced from artisan coffee shops.
100 PER CENT VEGAN, CRUELTY-FREE AND UK-MADE: Housed in a glass jar - fully recyclable packaging. Good for you, good for the world.
description: Product Description UpCircle Face Scrub Citrus formulated for dry/dehydrated skin with rosehip, sweet orange and lemon verbena essential oils. Buff away dry, dead cells to leave you feeling soft, smooth and glowy. Blended with shea butter to nourish the skin post-scrub. Orange oil acts as both an antiseptic and anti-inflammatory - perfect for soothing redness and irritation, whilst uplifting lemon verbena helps to tone the skin. Ingredients Coffea Arabica Seed Powder, Sucrose, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Fruit Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Oil, Lippia Citriodora (Lemon Verbena) Leaf Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus (Eucalyptus) Leaf Oil, Citrus Limonum (Lemon) Peel Oil, Cedrus Atlantica (Cedarwood) Bark Oil, Boswellia Serrata (Frankincense) Oil, Benzyl Alcohol, Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzoic Acid, Sorbic Acid, *Limonene, *Linalool. *Natural constituent of essential oils listed. Directions Apply to damp skin, gently massage in circular motions, then rinse off with water. Safety Warning For external use only. See more
